name: Acelewis.GitHub.io
tagline: A website for me to do things with
body:
### Alexander Charles Even Lewis (AceLewis)

### About me
I am a 4th year Physicist at The University of Nottingham, I am interested in Physics, Maths, Programming and also play a few games in my spare time. I have an interest in data and have made webscrapers to gather information that I can then process, I am currently looking into nice ways to display information easily in infographics using Python. I can code in Matlab, Python and have also made a Steam trading bot in Node.JS.


### Projects
* [Spintax](https://github.com/AceLewis/spintax)- A Python module to parse spintax, this was created so one of my bots can send people messages that are not the same every time.
* List all my projects
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
